fields.name: tool_name
fields.title: tool_name
fields.description: The tool must have a well identified name and not being just an item in the menu of a bigger tool (e.g. not the “sustainability check” option in a development tool)

fields.name: organization
fields.title: organization
fields.description: The legal entity having the intellectual property of the tool.

fields.name: website
fields.description: The tool must have a dedicated web page (landing page, github repo, etc.) describing its functionalities, its licensing, a.s.o . Required format is a URL.

fields.name: assessment_type
fields.description: Type of assessment the tool is designed for

fields.name: perimeters
fields.description: What is the general scope covered by the tool. Several values are possible.

enum: Infra / Cloud (for example: GCP, AWS, Azure, OVH Cloud)
Software / Mobile Apps (for example: Android App, iPhone App)
Software / Web Apps (for example: React, Spring, Node.js, ROR, PHP apps)
Software / Web Content (for example: WordPress, Drupal, Prestashop, Magento, etc.)

fields.name: environmental_indicators
fields.description: Environmental indicators utilized by the tool

enum: Final Energy consumption (usually in Joule per WattHour)
GWP: Global Warming Potential aka the carbon footprint usually in CO2 equivalent
ADPf (MJ): Abiotic resource Depletion Potential for fossil fuel usually in Antimony (Sb) equivalent
ADPe (Sbeq): Abiotic resource Depletion Potential for element (minerals, etc.) usually in Antimony (Sb) equivalent
Water Depletion also called water footprint

fields.name: functional_units
fields.description: Functional units considered in the assessment

fields.name: life_cycle_step
fields.description: Life cycle steps covered by the tool

enum: Not Applicable (to be selected if the tool is not based on an LCA)

fields.name: license
fields.description: Describe the legal environment of the intellectual property of the tool

fields.name: self-hostable
fields.description: Indicates whether the tool can be self-hosted

fields.name: originating_country
fields.description: Country where the tool originated (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code)

fields.name: logo
fields.description: URL to the logo of the tool

fields.name: methodology_transparency
fields.description: Level of transparency in the tool's methodology
enum: Disclosed only to internal stakeholders or clients

fields.name: inside_model
fields.description: name of the model

fields.name: model_site
fields.description: URL of the model

fields.name: main_data_source
fields.description: Main data sources used to build the the model

fields.name: model_creation_date
fields.description: Creation date of the model

fields.name: model_organization
fields.description: Organization that created the model

fields.name: main_scientific_sources
fields.description: Main scientific sources utilized by the tool

fields.name: main_focus
fields.description: Primary focus area of the tool

fields.name: focus
fields.description: Additional focus areas of the tool

fields.name: quick_description
fields.description: Ideally it should be the description provided by the owner of the tool.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Describe where the recording stands in the listing process:

fields.name: last_edit
fields.description: Date and time of last edit

fields.name: last_editor
fields.description: Editor who made the last edit
